type.description: Default value for `type` property which renders the template

name.description: Default value for `name` property to load the icon. (name) required in URL token to load specific icon

sizes.description: Array of set values for available icon sizes in px

url.description: CDN URL to fetch icons. (name) and (category) to replace in URL to get specific icon

category.description: Optional default value for category in URL. (category) required in URL token

fill.description: CSS fill value for the icon SVG
